Service.Name: Dev2MenuGenerationWizard

Action.Name: InvokeWorkflow

MapsTo="ButtonClickedCancel" Value="" /><Output Name="ButtonClickedDone" MapsTo="ButtonClickedDone" Value="" /></Outputs>" WebsiteServiceName="System" XMLConfiguration="<WebPage><WebPageServiceName>Dev2MenuGenerationWizard</WebPageServiceName><WebParts><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>0</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>0</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>1</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>0</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>2</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>0</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>3</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>0</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>0</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>1</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>1</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>1</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>2</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>1</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>HtmlWidget</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>3</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>1</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>
 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2WebServer>http://localhost:1234</Dev2WebServer>
 <XmlData>
 <Name></Name>
 <Value>
 <div id="treeWrapperResources" class="container">
 <input type="hidden" name="serializedTreeViewXML" id="serializedTreeViewXML" value="[[serializedTreeViewXML]]" />
 <input type="hidden" name="serializedTreeViewJSON" id="serializedTreeViewJSON" value="[[serializedTreeViewJSON]]" />
 <div id="menuResourceAdd" style="display:none;">
 <span>
 <label id="menuNameLabel" class="">Display Text</label>
 <input type="text" name="Dev2MenuDisplayText" id="Dev2MenuDisplayText" value="" maxlength="" class="" />
 </span>
 <br />
 <span>
 <label id="menuNameLinkLabel" class="">Link</label>
 <input type="text" name="Dev2MenuLink" id="Dev2MenuLink" value="" maxlength="" class="" />
 </span>
 </div>
 <div id="treeWrapperMenuItems" class="treeMenu">
 <button type="button" class="treeMenuButton" id="menuItemsAddOption"> Add </button>
 <button type="button" class="treeMenuButton" id="menuItemEdit"> Edit </button>
 <button type="button" class="treeMenuButton" id="menuItemsDelete"> Delete </button>
 </div>
 <div id="menuManager" class="treeContainer">
 <script>
			var tmpDepth = '[[maxDepth]]';
			var maxDepth = 1;
			
			if(tmpDepth.length &gt;= 1){
				maxDepth = tmpDepth;
			}

			var isMenuMode = 0;
			var isEditMode = 0;
			
			 $(function(){			 
					/* bind buttons as well */
					$("#menuManager").dynatree({
						dnd: {
							preventVoidMoves : true,
							onDragStart: function(node){
								return true;
							},
							onDragEnter : function(node, sourceNode){
								if(node.parent !== sourceNode.parent){
									return false;
								}
								return ["before", "after"];
							},
							onDrop : function(node, sourceNode, hitMode, ui, draggable){
								sourceNode.move(node, hitMode);
							}
						},
						children: [ [[serializedTreeViewJSON]] ]
						//children: [ {"title":" Menu","key":"_2","isFolder":true,"isLazy":false,"tooltip":" Menu","icon":"link_top.gif","addClass":null,"noLink":false,"activate":true,"focus":false,"expand":false,"select":false,"hideCheckbox":false,"unselectable":false,"children":[{"title":"abc","key":"_3","isFolder":false,"isLazy":false,"tooltip":"def","icon":"link.gif","addClass":null,"noLink":false,"activate":false,"focus":false,"expand":false,"select":false,"hideCheckbox":false,"unselectable":false,"parentNodeKey":"_2"},{"title":"efe","key":"_4","isFolder":false,"isLazy":false,"tooltip":"sdf","icon":"link.gif","addClass":null,"noLink":false,"activate":false,"focus":false,"expand":false,"select":false,"hideCheckbox":false,"unselectable":false,"parentNodeKey":"_2"}]} ]
					});
					
					// add dialog
					$("#menuResourceAdd").dialog({
														autoOpen : false,
														title : "Add Menu Item",
														width : 490,
														height: 190,
														resizable : false,
														buttons : [
																	{ 
																	 text : "Done",
																	 click : function(){ 
																			var text = $("#Dev2MenuDisplayText").val();
																			var link = $("#Dev2MenuLink").val();
																			
																			if(!isEditMode){
																				// add to menu tree 
																				if(text.length &gt; 0){
																					try{
																						// is there an active node?
																						var activeNode = $("#menuManager").dynatree("getActiveNode");
																						var tmpDepth = activeNode.data.depth;
																						var cNode = activeNode.addChild({
																							title : text,
																							tooltip : link,
																							isFolder: false,
																							parentNodeKey : activeNode.data.key,
																							depth : tmpDepth + 1
																							//icon: "link.gif"
																						});
																						
																						if(!activeNode.data.expand){
																							activeNode.toggleExpand();
																						}
																					}catch(e){}
																				}else{
																					alert("Display Text Not Provieded. Process Aborted.");
																				}
																				 
																			}else{
																				// edit mode
																				var activeNode = $("#menuManager").dynatree("getActiveNode");
																				activeNode.data.title = text;
																				activeNode.data.tooltop = link;
																				activeNode.render();
																			}
																			
																			pushMenuForPersist("menuManager", "serializedTreeViewXML", "serializedTreeViewJSON");
																			$(this).dialog("close");
																			
																		}
																	},
																	{ 
																	 text : "Cancel",
																	 click : function(){ $(this).dialog("close"); }
																	}
																 ]
													});
					
					
					// add menu option
					$("#menuItemsAddOption").click(function(){ 
						var activeNode = $("#menuManager").dynatree("getActiveNode");
						isEditMode = 0;
						var tmpDepth;
						if(activeNode != null){
						
						tmpDepth = activeNode.data.depth;
						}
						if(tmpDepth != maxDepth){
						
							try{
								$("#menuResourceAdd").dialog("option", "title", "Add Menu Option To [ "+activeNode.data.title + " ]");
								$("#menuResourceAdd").attr("src", "http://127.0.0.1:1234/services/ThemeMenuAdd");
								$("#Dev2MenuDisplayText").val("");
								$("#Dev2MenuLink").val("");
								
								
								$("#menuResourceAdd").dialog("open"); 
							}catch(e){
								//alert(e);
								alert("Please select menu item");
							}
						}else{
							alert("This menu only supports a max depth of " + maxDepth + "." );
						}
						
					});
					
					// delete button
					$("#menuItemsDelete").click(function(){
						var activeNode = $("#menuManager").dynatree("getActiveNode");
	
						try{
							if(activeNode.data.title != "[[Dev2MenuName]] Menu"){
								if(activeNode.data.tooltip != "[[Dev2MenuName]] Menu"){ 
									activeNode.remove();
								}
							}
						}catch(e){
							alert(e);
						}
						pushMenuForPersist("menuManager", "serializedTreeViewXML", "serializedTreeViewJSON");
					});
					
					// edit menu option
					$("#menuItemEdit").click(function(){ 
						var activeNode = $("#menuManager").dynatree("getActiveNode");
						isEditMode = 1;
						try{
							if(activeNode.data.title != "[[Dev2MenuName]] Menu"){
								if(activeNode.data.tooltip != "[[Dev2MenuName]] Menu"){ 
									$("#menuResourceAdd").dialog("option", "title", "Edit [ "+activeNode.data.title + " ]");
									$("#menuResourceAdd").attr('src', "http://127.0.0.1:1234/services/ThemeMenuAdd?Dev2MenuDisplayText");
									$("#Dev2MenuDisplayText").val(activeNode.data.title);
									$("#Dev2MenuLink").val(activeNode.data.tooltip);
									$("#menuResourceAdd").dialog("open"); 
								}
							}
						}catch(e){
							alert(e);
						}
						pushMenuForPersist("menuManager", "serializedTreeViewXML", "serializedTreeViewJSON");
					});
					
					// do the binding here
					try{
						 var rootNode = $("#menuManager").dynatree("getRoot");
						 if(!rootNode.hasChildren()){
							// add the root menu node
							rootNode.addChild({
									title : "[[Dev2MenuName]] Menu",
									tooltip : "[[Dev2MenuName]] Menu",
									isFolder: true,
									depth : 0
									//icon: "link_top.gif"
							});
						 }
					}catch(e){
						alert(e);
					}
			});
		</script>
 </div>
 </div>
 </Value>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>0</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>2</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>1</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>2</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>HtmlWidget</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>2</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>2</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>
 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2WebServer>http://127.0.0.1:1234</Dev2WebServer>
 <XmlData>
 <Name></Name>
 <Value>
 <div style="height:35px; width:100%;"></div>
 </Value>
 <cssClass></cssClass>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>3</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>2</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>0</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>3</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName></WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>1</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>3</RowIndex></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>Button</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>2</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>3</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>
 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2WebServer>http://127.0.0.1:1234</Dev2WebServer>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2elementNameButton>ButtonClickedCancel</Dev2elementNameButton>
 <displayTextButton>Cancel</displayTextButton>
 <btnType>custom</btnType>
 <customButtonCode>exitWizard();</customButtonCode>
 <Dev2tabIndexButton></Dev2tabIndexButton>
 <Dev2toolTipButton></Dev2toolTipButton>
 <Dev2customStyleButton></Dev2customStyleButton>
 <Dev2widthButton></Dev2widthButton>
 <Dev2heightButton></Dev2heightButton>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><WebPart><WebPartServiceName>Button</WebPartServiceName><ColumnIndex>3</ColumnIndex><RowIndex>3</RowIndex><Dev2XMLResult>
 <sr>
 <sr>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2ResumeData>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2WebServer>http://127.0.0.1:1234</Dev2WebServer>
 <XmlData>
 <Dev2elementNameButton>ButtonClickedDone</Dev2elementNameButton>
 <displayTextButton>Done</displayTextButton>
 <btnType>submit</btnType>
 <customButtonCode>hackPushMenu();</customButtonCode>
 <Dev2tabIndexButton></Dev2tabIndexButton>
 <Dev2toolTipButton></Dev2toolTipButton>
 <Dev2customStyleButton></Dev2customStyleButton>
 <Dev2widthButton></Dev2widthButton>
 <Dev2heightButton></Dev2heightButton>
 </XmlData>
 <Async />
 </XmlData>
 </Dev2ResumeData>
 </XmlData>
 </sr>
 </sr>
</Dev2XMLResult></WebPart><Rows>4</Rows><Cols>4</Cols></WebParts></WebPage>" /> </FlowStep> </Flowchart.StartNode> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>

Service.AuthorRoles: Domain Users,Windows SBS Remote Web Workplace Users,Windows SBS Fax Users,Windows SBS Folder Redirection Accounts,All Users,Windows SBS SharePoint_MembersGroup,Windows SBS Link Users,Company Users,Business Design Studio Developers,
